entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero except near plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets except rain along parts of the coast. Rainfall amount 10 mm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero except near plus 1 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
